messages.text:
LGTM

On Mon, Dec 12, 2011 at 1:27 PM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> A+C: add Christoph Hack (individual CLA)
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5485048/
>
> Affected files:
>  M AUTHORS
>  M CONTRIBUTORS
>
>
> Index: AUTHORS
> ===================================================================
> --- a/AUTHORS
> +++ b/AUTHORS
> @@ -38,6 +38,7 @@
>  Chris Jones <chris@cjones.org>
>  Chris Lennert <calennert@gmail.com>
>  Christian Himpel <chressie@googlemail.com>
> +Christoph Hack <christoph@tux21b.org>
>  Christopher Nielsen <m4dh4tt3r@gmail.com>
>  Christopher Wedgwood <cw@f00f.org>
>  Clement Skau <clementskau@gmail.com>
> Index: CONTRIBUTORS
> ===================================================================
> --- a/CONTRIBUTORS
> +++ b/CONTRIBUTORS
> @@ -74,6 +74,7 @@
>  Chris Jones <chris@cjones.org> <chris.jones.yar@gmail.com>
>  Chris Lennert <calennert@gmail.com>
>  Christian Himpel <chressie@googlemail.com> <chressie@gmail.com>
> +Christoph Hack <christoph@tux21b.org>
>  Christopher Nielsen <m4dh4tt3r@gmail.com>
>  Christopher Wedgwood <cw@f00f.org>
>  Clement Skau <clementskau@gmail.com>
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a601ceb68002 ***

A+C: add Christoph Hack (individual CLA)

R=golang-dev, dsymonds, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5485048

subject: code review 5485048: A+C: add Christoph Hack (individual CLA)
